holidays.title: Ancestor Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Get ready to trace your genealogy, while recalling the achievements of your ancestors.

holidays.title: Day of the French Community
holidays.description: We celebrate an important day for Belgium’s French-speaking community.

holidays.title: Egypt: Al-Mouled Al-Nabawy
holidays.description: Egypt celebrates Al-Mouled Al-Nabawy in honor of Prophet Muhammad’s birth. Join us as we commemorate it!

holidays.title: Milad an-Nabi (Mawlid)
holidays.description: Milad an-Nabi, is celebrated by Muslims as the birthday of the Prophet Muhammad.

holidays.title: Morning Show Hosts Day
holidays.description: Enjoy your early morning routine by putting on your favorite morning show.

holidays.title: National AJ Day
holidays.description: Calling all A.Js… this day is for you and your short, punchy name.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Milk Day
holidays.description: Our childhood senses are tingling!

holidays.title: NATIONAL CORNED BEEF HASH DAY
holidays.description: Whip up homemade corned beef hash with leftovers, and serve at breakfast or dinner!

holidays.title: NATIONAL CRUSH A CAN DAY
holidays.description: It’s time to crush some cans and raise awareness about the need to recycle!

holidays.title: National Crush Day
holidays.description: Do your part in protecting Mother Earth and crush (pun intended) the issue of global wastage.

holidays.title: National No Excuses Day
holidays.description: Today is the day that we stop making excuses and make sure that we have fun.

holidays.title: National Scarf Day
holidays.description: Add another dimension to your outfit today and adorn yourself with a scarf.

holidays.title: National Women’s Health And Fitness Day
holidays.description: Join women all over in commemorating this special day promoting the importance of health awareness and fitness.

holidays.title: Prophet Muhammad’s birthday
holidays.description: Prophet Muhammad’s Birthday commemorates the birth of the religion of Islam’s founder.

holidays.title: Avril Lavigne’s Birthday
holidays.description: The fruits of passion and ambition bloomed at an early age for this pop-punk icon!

holidays.title: Domics’s Birthday
holidays.description: Domics is our favorite storyteller, and, boy, does he have stories to tell!

holidays.title: Gwyneth Paltrow’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s just nothing that this full-time mom, actress, and businesswoman can’t do!

holidays.title: Jaiden Animations’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s funny, creative, and encouraging! Find out more about one of YouTube’s prominent creators.

holidays.title: Jenna Ortega’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jenna Ortega has made a name for herself in the industry! Let’s celebrate her today.

holidays.title: Lil Wayne’s Birthday
holidays.description: Starting at the young age of 12, his music career soared to success!

holidays.title: Meat Loaf’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meat Loaf will always be remembered as a mesmerizing star who exceeded all expectations.

holidays.title: Mitski’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented artist’s stunning and heartfelt music has won over audiences worldwide!

holidays.title: Rockabillykitty’s Birthday
holidays.description: This delightfully weird YouTuber once took the internet by storm by creating videos about “Animal Wild.”

holidays.title: Shep Rose’s Birthday
holidays.description: This handsome writer, actor, and businessman is the definition of Southern charm.
